resources.string: Welcome to the Committee page, below this message is a list of the committee members, along with their position and their contact email.

Brocon is a convention organised by the Games Society and the Anime and Manga Society of the University of Limerick. We raise money for Piera House, A suicide prevention and help centre.(the number provided is for Pieta House Limerick)

The art presented when the app was opened and for the icon of the app was kindly created by Rachel Fleming for Brocon. She can be countacted via her E-mail for commissions here: RachelF006@yahoo.co.uk
The Programming and Design of the application were created for this app and for Brocon by Jason Fahy. Can be contacted here:
